Following a day filled with vigorous activity at Red Rocks, we found ourselves in dire need of nourishment, and it is no exaggeration to say that this particular dining establishment exceeded our expectations in every conceivable manner. Not only did the menu offerings boast unparalleled freshness and an abundance of flavor, but the attentiveness and cordiality displayed by the waitstaff left us feeling truly gratified. My sole lamentation, if I may be so bold as to express one, was that my stomach capacity proved insufficient to accommodate the copious amounts of delectable fare available, leaving me with an unquenchable yearning for more of their exceptional pizza, a craving that lingers still."
Been visiting this location for years. The staff is always friendly, the store is almost always in order and things are easy to find. Never had a single problem here. Love them.

"Our predilections incline towards the savory delights of the miso soup, the seafood extravaganza that is the mermaid, and the delectable baked lobster roll. As a parent, I relish the opportunity to frequent this establishment with my progeny, as we derive immense pleasure from partaking in the culinary offerings. The ambiance is conducive to a relaxing dining experience, with the added bonus of being able to observe the skilled artisanship of the sushi chefs. Additionally, the midday specials are priced at an affordable rate, and the hospitality of the staff is truly commendable. Moreover, the premises are meticulously maintained, ensuring an environment that exudes spotlessness."

This constituted, by a considerable margin, the most optimal discovery in an extended period of time. We undertook a visitation on this particular Sunday at approximately 10:30, which was followed by a brief waiting period of five minutes, a remarkably diminutive duration considering the day of the week. Our culinary selections were promptly prepared and presented to us in a timely fashion, allowing us to partake in an enjoyable repast. The quality of the comestibles was truly exceptional, and the generous proportions of each dish further contributed to our overall satisfaction. Based on my personal experience during this initial visit, I would unhesitatingly advocate this establishment to any individual seeking a comparable dining experience. Notwithstanding the slightly elevated cost of beverages, we each opted for distinct menu items, all of which were deemed palatable.

"A remarkable array of botanical specimens, including an abundance of coniferous species, notably those utilized for seasonal decorative purposes during the winter months, such as Christmas trees, which are prominently displayed throughout the premises at this time of year, thereby creating a picturesque atmosphere that invites visitors to return and explore the remainder of the estate's extensive gardens, while also benefiting from the assistance of a team of accommodating staff members who graciously facilitate the transportation of said arboreal specimens onto the rooftop of one's vehicle, if desired."

"Substantially superior to my preconceived notions! This establishment offers a trifecta of intrigue, featuring an array of conspiratorial undertones, vivid depictions of bloodshed, and a nod to illicit activities. Certain aspects of the exhibit may prove visually perturbing for those who identify as easily squeamish or faint of heart; thus, a caveat is issued to potential patrons. Its placement within the city of Las Vegas serves as a fitting backdrop, given its reputation for indulgence and vice. Furthermore, I capitalized on a financial discount by utilizing the Yelp application, affording me a brief respite from the ubiquitous gaming venues."

"Indubitably, the most extraordinary and captivating production I have had the privilege of witnessing, I must say that I derived immense pleasure from it. My affection for it knows no bounds, and I am compelled to emphasize that my enthusiasm for the performance is not limited to those who belong to the Beatles' era. In point of fact, I found each moment of the show to be utterly enthralling and left me in a state of unadulterated euphoria. Furthermore, I am reluctant to divulge any specific details, as I am convinced that your experience will be equally, if not more, enjoyable than mine. Suffice it to say that you will not be let down."

Im a sucker for a good Hole in the Wall...and this totally fit the bill. \n\nSuper nice, and very sexy bartenders sling very strong and inexpensive drinks. Not on the path for the normal Vegas tourist, but totally a place id be happy to visit again.

"The efficacy of the procurement and culinary experience at this establishment was conspicuously evident, as the brief moment of hesitation in securing a table was swiftly resolved upon my arrival, thereby allowing me to thoroughly enjoy the delectable fare and picturesque panorama that this venue has to offer."

What a great Happy Hour at La Stalla!  My wife and I go quite a bit for an early dinner and can walk out for less than $20. 

Happy Hour is every evening from 4 - 6 an we usually get a beer or two a piece (at only $2) and great authentic Italian pizza (at only $5 a pie).  

When we've ate a full dinner - it's always been great as well. The desserts are fantastic ... Check out La Stalla!

"The Cosmopolitan has rapidly transformed into one of my preferred Las Vegas hotels on the strip, particularly for those seeking spectacular vistas. We had the pleasure of reserving a terrace studio with a fountain view for our recent weekend getaway, and I must say that it was utterly breathtaking. Among the select few hotels offering a balcony, The Cosmo stands out, allowing us to immerse ourselves in the enchanting Bellagio Fountains each evening.

The positives of this luxurious establishment are numerous, beginning with its sleek and sophisticated ambiance. Strategically positioned in the heart of the renowned Las Vegas Strip, The Cosmopolitan boasts an unparalleled location, making it an ideal choice for those desiring prime access to the city's vibrant attractions. Additionally, the hotel distinguishes itself by forgoing the customary daily resort fee of $25, a welcome departure from the standard practice.

Furthermore, The Cosmopolitan features an array of delectable dining options, including the highly sought-after Secret Pizza, ensuring that guests can indulge in culinary delights without venturing far from their stylish accommodations. As an added incentive, the hotel now offers a generous $150 resort credit for stays of three nights or longer, providing visitors with an opportunity to experience the property's diverse amenities and services without additional cost.

Lastly, it is worth mentioning that the interior of The Cosmopolitan exudes modernity and spotlessness, creating a welcoming atmosphere that complements its already impressive offerings."

Free entrance,  free champagne all night for ladies,huka section, dance section, and 2 bars. The rooms are dark and sexy. What more could you ask for?  Enough said.\n\nHOWEVER, 2 well drinks=$26 bucks. ouch!

"A duo of suggestions, if we may be so bold as to proffer them - the delectable delicatessen situated on the Grand Canal level boasts a self-serve soda fountain, thereby rendering refills complimentary; meanwhile, the convenience of Self Park cannot be overstated, as it lies in close proximity to the guest room elevators, whereas the alternative option of valet parking necessitates a trek through the casino's labyrinthine confines prior to reaching said elevators, thus making Self Park the more expedient choice for those desirous of minimizing their pedestrian perambulations within the gaming establishment."

"Enduring recollections of this venue...February fourteenth, nineteen hundred and ninety-nine...Exceptional quality of service, meticulously refined culinary offerings, yet harmoniously synchronized with its geographical context, this establishment continues to hold its own against other premier dining destinations. Provided that one can tolerate the idiosyncratic and fastidious patronage (including, but not limited to, those who identify as ardent supporters of the late Senator Barry Goldwater's political ideologies and display behaviors indicative of a state of inebriation), a visit to Vincent's promises to be a worthwhile investment of resources."

It is patently evident that this establishment formerly served as a financial institution, however upon entering, the ambiance and decor create an illusion that transcends the mundane reality of a bank, metamorphosing the space into a charming eatery reminiscent of those found in Italy, albeit without the genuine Tuscan fare. The hospitable staff contributed significantly to the enjoyment of our dining experience, as they exhibited remarkable proficiency in their duties and displayed commendable levels of cordiality towards patrons. Notwithstanding an unfortunate incident involving a server and a tray of beverages, the employees demonstrated laudable teamwork and camaraderie in addressing the situation, much to the relief of the affected customers. 

The culinary offerings at Rigatony's proved to be exceptional, with the Veal with Lemon and Artichoke sauce earning highest praise from this writer, while my sibling's selection of the Catalonian dish elicited rapturous approval. A visual representation of our dining experience shall be forthcoming, but rest assured that Rigatony's has earned our hearty endorsement and enthusiastic recommendation. Bravo!

Last night, we commemorated our matrimonial milestone with a delectable culinary experience at this esteemed eatery, whereupon we relished tender and savory steaks that literally melted in our mouths, complemented by exceptional hospitality that greatly enhanced our gastronomic indulgence, thereby rendering our meal an unforgettable memory.

"The slow-cooked pot roast boasts an unparalleled depth of flavor, complemented by the exceptional quality of service delivered by the establishment's staff, particularly noteworthy given the high volume of patrons on a hectic Friday evening. Moreover, this esteemed eatery ranks among the premier dining and drinking establishments in the vicinity of Lawrenceville."

" Fern's culinary experience was utterly remarkable, as I, an ardent adherent of a plant-based diet for nearly a decade, can unequivocally attest. This eatery's exceptional quality was exemplified by the staff's proficiency in catering to diverse dietary preferences, including the seamless integration of vegan options. Furthermore, the ambiance of the establishment exuded an endearing charm, striking a harmonious balance between elegance and unpretentiousness. The visual appeal of the interior design was simply captivating. However, the true pice de rsistance lay in Chef Alyssa's artistry, as each dish we sampled showcased an unparalleled mastery of flavor profiles and ingenuity in combining fresh, succulent vegetables. Regardless of one's dietary inclinations, a visit to this gastronomic gem is imperative; it promises to leave an indelible mark on even the most discerning palate."

I recently visited this establishment with the intention of acquiring a treadmill, and my experience was utterly delightful! Upon entering the designated area, I was promptly approached by a sales associate named Randy, who inquired about my needs and provided me with satisfactory responses to my queries. Following my selection, he facilitated the transaction with remarkable efficiency, allowing me to proceed to the pick-up location without any undue delay. The pick-up area itself was somewhat unremarkable in its ambiance, yet Sears' primary objective is to minimize waiting time for their patrons. To achieve this, they employ a system whereby customers scan their receipts using a barcode reader, which enables them to monitor the progress of their orders on a display screen. Remarkably, within a mere 50 seconds (a fact that I can verify with absolute certainty, given that the screen was displaying a countdown of the processing time), Wes emerged from the double doors bearing my shiny new treadmill! He subsequently loaded it into my vehicle, and I was able to depart the premises with utmost expediency, bringing my exceptional shopping excursion to a triumphant conclusion. The entire purchasing process, from start to finish, lasted no more than 30 minutes, making for a truly extraordinary encounter!

"Exceptional individuals, exceptional establishment. Eminent professionals within the realm of cycling endeavour assiduously to deliver a superior experience for patrons, surpassing novel standards. Accessibility and collective excursions are prime attributes, rendering the enterprise worthy of highest commendation. A visit is imperative to appreciate the vast array of options available."

During our brief sojourn in the urban precincts, we were eager to sample the culinary offerings of a locally renowned eatery, preferably one that had garnered favorable critiques from gastronomic aficionados. Our quest for an edible adventure led us to The Dish, a purportedly exceptional dining establishment whose reputation was preceded by an impressive array of accolades. Upon partaking in their delectable fare, we were thoroughly convinced of the veracity of such praise, as each bite exuded an unmistakable aura of freshness and homemade quality, thereby ensuring our eagerness to revisit this epicurean haven at a future date, specifically for the purpose of indulging in their tantalizing dessert offerings.

"I recently partook in a delectable dining experience at this establishment, which culminated in my being accorded a sense of belonging akin to that of a family member by the time my meal had concluded. This eatery exudes an air of authenticity, boasting a harmonious blend of classic tunes and rustic ambiance that strikes a chord with patrons (a formula that unquestionably proves effective). The pricing, as indicated on the Yelp guide, is slightly misleading; it fails to accurately convey the exceptional value offered by this cozy venue. Upon entering, one cannot help but feel immediately at ease, enveloped by the warmth and hospitality of the accommodating staff who are dedicated to ensuring a pleasurable dining experience. The cuisine, both flavorsome and visually appealing, is served at a most reasonable price point, making it an accessible indulgence for even the most discerning palate. Furthermore, while the guide suggests that dancing is not advisable, I found that a spontaneous display of jubilation could not be contained, and thus, I felt compelled to sway to the rhythm of the music, unencumbered by any constraints. Suffice it to say, I shall return to this culinary haven with great anticipation."

"Troy has been entrusted with an array of endeavors for my benefit, encompassing a broad spectrum of tasks such as painting a structure and executing minor wall restorations. Each time a novel undertaking arises, I ponder whether he will finally be posed with a challenge that he cannot surmount; however, this anticipation remains unfulfilled. It is evident that Troy's primary motivation lies not in monetary gain or expedited project completion, but rather in ensuring an exceptionally high level of customer contentment. Following the culmination of his work, it is customary for him to conduct multiple follow-up assessments to ensure that the client's satisfaction reaches an unequivocal peak of 100%."

We visited this establishment on the occasion of Valentine's Day, and our experience was truly exceptional. Every aspect of the culinary offerings was meticulously prepared and presented with an unparalleled level of quality, and the attentive and responsive service we received from Joon and his team significantly enhanced our overall satisfaction. Without hesitation, we would highly recommend this venue to anyone seeking a refined dining experience that will leave an indelible mark on their memory.

"I frequent this establishment with considerable regularity, and I must say that the culinary offerings here are truly exceptional. The ambiance is also quite pleasant, creating an ideal setting for a satisfying dining experience. Of particular note is their lemonade, which was freshly squeezed to perfection during my last visit. Additionally, the portion sizes of their pastries are generous, making it unlikely that a single individual will be able to consume an entire pastry on their own."

This place is great!  I have a flock of chickens and they need food.  Tempe Feed and Tack is close to my house (of course! I live in tempe...) and the people are super helpful and friendly.  They always load up the 50lb bags of feed and I never have to wait.

Upscale. Expensive. But the food and service are beyond compare. The restaurant is merely a block from the Belk theater, so it's great for dinner beforehand or drinks afterwards. Look at their website to really get a look into this restaurant & how they serve their proteins, individually off of \"spits\". Filet mignonette, ribeye, pork, scallops, shrimp, lamb, bacon wrapped chicken etc.

"Bacchanal Buffet in Las Vegas offers an unparalleled dining experience, surpassing Wicked Spoon in terms of variety and quality. Upon entering, we were immediately struck by the abundance of seafood options, including crab, shrimp, oysters, salmon, seabass, and more, neatly arranged in generous piles. As we made our way through the buffet, we discovered a diverse array of culinary styles, each one showcasing expertly prepared dishes that catered to a wide range of palates. Of particular note was the dedicated fresh juice station, featuring horchata among other refreshing options, which provided a delightful respite from the richness of the meal. The dessert section, located centrally and prominently, boasted an impressive selection of elegant pastries and a gelato station, further enhancing the already exceptional dining experience. We had the good fortune of visiting during a late lunchtime, allowing us to enjoy dinner-quality fare at a reduced price, making the experience even more satisfying and memorable."

"The Jeep Wrangler Rubicon boasts an impressive seven windows and a sleek strip on its frontage, while the rear features limousine-tinted glass, complemented by Minnesota-manufactured MN 35 window film on both the driver's and passenger's sides. The total cost for this premium upgrade was a mere $160, thanks to the exceptional customer service and hospitality displayed by the establishment's staff, resulting in a truly remarkable and aesthetically pleasing finish."

One of our quintessential downtown Phoenix establishments, this eatery has proven to be a steadfast purveyor of delectable cuisine, with their strawberry blueberry cashew salad and margaritas being particular standouts among an array of mouth-watering offerings. Furthermore, their spicy harissa fries have been known to elicit rave reviews from patrons, while their hummus has garnered widespread acclaim for its rich, velvety texture and subtle tang of flavor. In essence, it appears that this restaurant has perfected the art of culinary satisfaction, as evidenced by the sheer diversity of menu items that have managed to captivate the palates of even the most discerning gastronomes. Thus, it can be safely inferred that a visit to this beloved dining spot is sure to result in a truly gratifying experience, regardless of one's order.

"Upon conducting a thorough examination of local chiropractic facilities, I opted to establish communication with this particular office subsequent to encountering an unresponsive demeanor at a separate establishment. Following a brief yet efficient telephonic conversation, during which I confirmed the veracity of my insurance coverage, I arranged an appointment for the succeeding day. Upon arriving at the facility, I had the pleasure of meeting Dr. Haggard, whose affable nature left a profound impression upon me. After engaging in a cordial conversation, undergoing radiographic imaging, and receiving prompt medical attention, I was gratified to have experienced such a seamless and accommodating process. Furthermore, I received a considerate telephone call from Dr. Haggard himself the following day, inquiring about my wellbeing, and subsequently attended a follow-up consultation wherein we scrutinized the concluding radiographs and formulated an appropriate corrective strategy. In conclusion, I have been thoroughly delighted with the exceptional quality of care, attentive follow-up, and amiable demeanor displayed by the staff at Haggard Chiropractic, distinguishing them as a premier example within the chiropractic field."

Monica has proven herself to be an unwavering guardian of my tresses, earning my utmost confidence through her exceptional proficiency in both haircutting and coloring techniques. Her salon's welcoming ambiance makes for a thoroughly enjoyable experience, leaving me feeling utterly content and satisfied with my coiffure. I shall remain steadfast in my loyalty to her expertise, refusing to entrust my locks to any other stylist.

"My unwavering admiration for Southwest Airlines is rooted in their unparalleled customer-centric approach, which is exemplified by their generous two-bag policy, affordable fares, and exceptional customer service. However, it was their seamless cancellation process that genuinely astounded me, as opposed to my previous experiences with American Airlines, where canceling a flight was an arduous and costly endeavor. With Southwest, I merely had to contact their customer service department the night prior to my scheduled flight, and they promptly issued a confirmation of cancellation, graciously waiving any exorbitant fees. Moreover, I was able to effortlessly rebook another flight while taking advantage of the competitive prices advertised on their website, all without incurring any additional charges. Such remarkable dedication to customer satisfaction has solidified my loyalty to this airline, and I shall unhesitatingly opt for Southwest whenever feasible."

"A multifaceted, climate-controlled shopping center that offers a diverse array of retail establishments and recreational activities for visitors of all ages. This expansive indoor mall boasts an abundance of stores catering to various interests and preferences, ensuring an enjoyable experience for everyone. Ladies, be sure to don appropriate footwear that allows for optimal comfort and mobility, as you will undoubtedly desire to peruse the numerous shops offering exceptional deals and discounts. Gentlemen, do not feel excluded, as there are ample opportunities for you to explore and engage in, including specialized stores catering to your interests and needs. Additionally, families can delight in a plethora of entertainment options, such as an arcade, state-of-the-art IMAX theatre, captivating aquarium, themed restaurants, and numerous dining establishments serving a wide range of culinary delights. An ideal destination for a family outing or personal indulgence, this mall promises to provide an unforgettable experience."

I am sorry I hadn't been here before. From the outside you have no idea what hidden treasures are inside. Everything we had as appetizers and our meals were great.  I love the new variety to our palettes. I highly recommend you come here.

"I required several items I had acquired from a girlfriend to be relocated within a brief period of seven days. Following numerous unsuccessful attempts to secure the services of various moving companies, including Get Your Move On, I was informed by Roger that he would accommodate my request the following day. My incredulity was palpable when he affirmed that he was referring to the forthcoming Sunday. Furthermore, he provided me with a precise schedule detailing the exact time he would arrive at both my girlfriend's residence and mine, thus eliminating any uncertainty regarding their arrival timeframe. Upon witnessing the efficient and careful handling of my belongings, I was thoroughly impressed by their exceptional customer service. Without hesitation, I would enthusiastically utilize their services again in the future."

"This establishment boasts a female mechanical specialist. The scarcity of females within the realm of automotive expertise is indeed palpable, and a greater representation of women in this field would be highly advantageous. Upon requesting an examination of my vehicle's clutch system, despite their limited capacity as a partial service auto shop, I was delighted to discover that my clutch functioned appropriately. My previous experiences during periods of extreme temperatures had rendered my clutch prone to slipping excessively during the summer months and becoming overly responsive in the winter season. However, upon conducting a thorough assessment, the competent technicians at this facility demonstrated that my automobile was free from any significant flaws, attributable to a mere design imperfection associated with my car's hydraulic self-adjusting clutch pedal. Notably, the duration of time spent engaging in conversation with Adriana, the skilled female mechanic, prior to the return of my vehicle, complete with fresh oil, filter, and airbox filter replacements, was merely five minutes. It is worth noting that while the cost may be slightly higher compared to routine maintenance at a Toyota dealership, the efficiency of the service provided by this establishment far surpasses the lengthier wait times often exceeding two or even three hours, despite the inclusion of a comprehensive 21-point inspection offered by Toyota, which ultimately proves to be comparable to the services rendered by JiffyLube."

Upon arriving at the establishment, one cannot help but ponder whether or not the donning of a bulletproof vest would have been a judicious decision. Upon entering the premises, it becomes apparent that the interior design has remained untouched since the year 1950, prompting a profound meditation on the culinary magnificence that is soon to grace one's palate. Perusing the menu (whose prices have been carefully shielded with adhesive tape) and opting to communicate one's order through an authentic Alexander Graham Bell telephone, the linguistic barrier encountered when attempting to comprehend the responses uttered by the female staff member becomes irrelevant. All that is truly necessary is the procurement of the BBQ Minced sandwich accompanied by a 1/4 BBQ chicken (consisting of white meat). Although certain individuals may assert that the sandwich could benefit from an increased quantity of BBQ sauce, such critics should consider taking a blindfolded stroll along Wilkinson Boulevard. This eatery is unequivocally singular, as evidenced by the exceptional personnel who work there. The male employees exude humor, efficiency, and a sartorial penchant for garments with holes in them. In conclusion, any individual finding themselves in Charlotte would be remiss not to partake in a visit to this restaurant. It is imperative to bear in mind, however, that financial transactions conducted via credit cards are not accepted, thus necessitating the possession of cash.

During my recent sojourn, I opted to visit this eatery and sample their culinary offerings, and I must say that I was thoroughly impressed by the gargantuan proportions of their dishes, which were simultaneously tantalizing and reasonably priced. Moreover, the fact that each dish was meticulously prepared from scratch only served to enhance the delectability of the fare, thereby rendering it an unmitigated delight for my taste buds. Consequently, I would highly recommend this establishment to anyone seeking a satisfying repast.

"For over two decades, Sue and her team have successfully operated a distinguished dining establishment in the east valley, offering an impressive array of delectable Chinese cuisine within a warm and inviting atmosphere. The exceptional quality of their culinary offerings is complemented by an unparalleled level of customer service, making it a truly unique and satisfying experience for patrons. While the term 'pretty standard' may be subjective when applied to Chinese fare, it is undeniable that this particular eatery stands out among its peers, including prominent chain restaurants in the area. Furthermore, for those who wish to indulge in a more adventurous dining experience, the Moo Shu dish, skillfully crafted and presented at your table, offers a thrilling gustatory exploration. Additionally, the Golden Gate shrimp, a crispy delight, is highly recommended for those with a penchant for fried delights. It is worth noting that by choosing to dine at this locally owned business, you are supporting the local community and contributing to the economic vitality of the region."

I have had the pleasure of partaking in the culinary delights offered by Central Bistro on multiple occasions, specifically twice for the delectable brunch menu available during the weekends and four times for the exquisite dinner menu presented in the evenings. Upon entering the establishment, I have been consistently impressed by the elegantly designed open layout, complete with lofty ceilings and sleek marble tabletops, which creates an atmosphere conducive to an exceptional dining experience. The hospitable hostesses have always extended a warm welcome, setting the tone for the impeccable service that follows. I have had the privilege of being served by several knowledgeable servers, each of whom has demonstrated a profound understanding of the diverse menu offerings and expertly crafted cocktails. One particularly memorable beverage was the lemoncello sour, an innovative twist on the classic whiskey sour, whose intricate preparation process was thoroughly explained by our attentive server. He even showcased a small batch of Italian black cherries, graciously offering us a sample of the luxurious ingredient used in the cocktail's garnish. My unwavering affection for brunch has led me to savor every morsel of Central Bistro's delectable morning fare, with the eggs Benedict and chicken and waffles being my absolute favorites. These dishes are truly divine, making them highly recommended for any individual seeking a satisfying breakfast or lunch experience. In conclusion, Central Bistro is an unparalleled dining destination, boasting an impressive ambiance, exceptional service, and above all, sublime cuisine that will undoubtedly leave an indelible mark on your palate.

The rack of lamb was great!  Also, the view from where we were sitting was breathtaking! The Bellagio fountains, the Bellagio sign just everything...it was my anniversary and I'm so happy that we went to this place.  The staff were attentive to every need. ;-)

I loved this place. I wondered if the hot dogs would be overpriced, but they were really reasonable. A lot of different styles to choose from.\nWe didn't get any fries because they were $4 and a small portion. Drinks were pricey too. \nBut I'll definitely go back for the hotdogs.

This marked my maiden encounter with a timeshare.  My esteemed companion extended an invitation to me to share her lodgings.  If one is seeking a tranquil alternative to the frenetic energy of the Las Vegas Strip, replete with inebriated revelers, this establishment offers a most satisfactory option.  During my sojourn, I had occasion to observe numerous family units availing themselves of the facilities and services offered by the property.  The accommodations themselves were appointed with a plethora of amenities, including but not limited to: a spacious room, air conditioning, a fully operational kitchen, laundry facilities, a fireplace, a barbecue, and two televisions.  Furthermore, the premises boasted an impressive array of recreational and leisure opportunities, encompassing four swimming pools, a pair of hot tubs, a fitness center, and a dedicated recreation room.  Additionally, patrons could avail themselves of a convenient mini-market, situated in the heart of the property, which offered an assortment of sundries and beverages, including those of the Starbucks persuasion.  A shuttle service, operating on the hour, facilitated transportation to the nearby Monte Carlo resort, whence one could proceed further along the Strip via a brisk pedestrian traverse to the MGM, thence avails oneself of the rapid transit rail system.  Moreover, a supplementary shuttle service, conducted on a daily basis, afforded access to a nearby Vons grocery store, whereupon I availed myself of certain victuals and sundries, inclusive of a repast at the Taco Bell located within the same commercial complex.  Finally, upon request, the establishment furnished a shuttle service to the airport, the tariff for which amounted to a mere $9, in contradistinction to the potentially more extravagant expense of engaging a taxi.  Verily, an unmitigated delight!

"Their precursory offerings are of an exceptionally superior quality, rendering them utterly delectable... I also greatly appreciate their daily menu, which features a diverse array of fresh, locally-sourced produce and utilizes only the finest ingredients. The salad that accompanies each entree is truly sublime! In conclusion, this establishment is of unparalleled excellence. However, it is wise to note that due to its immense popularity, it tends to become rather crowded, hence planning one's visit in advance is highly recommended."

"Excellent beverage establishment! The ambiance manifests itself in a manner that is reminiscent of an authentic tiki lounge. On the evening of February 14th, I visited this location and observed that it was teeming with patrons; however, I was able to secure a seating arrangement while my companion remained standing until a vacant seat became available. The two mixologists on duty were indeed active in their endeavors to serve an extensive array of potent potables, yet they remained affable and engaging, taking the time to converse with me regarding their offerings and proffering suggestions. In response to an inquiry regarding my preferences, I opted for a beverage served in a commemorative container, specifically the Wild Watusi cup, which was adorned with a resplendent glow emanating from the display case housing the various samples. Subsequent to my selection, the bartender suggested a concoction featuring flavors of passion fruit and guava, which, upon consumption, proved to be a delightful fusion of tastes and spirits. Notwithstanding its delectability, the beverage did not possess an excessive degree of sweetness or syrup-like consistency, thereby rendering it a superior example of its genre. Upon completion of my libation, the staff meticulously cleansed and repositioned my tiki cup and swizzle stick within its original packaging. My desire to revisit this establishment and accumulate an assortment of these unique vessels,  la Pokemon, remains unabated."

"Similarly, at this particular establishment, they possess an extensive array of products, much like their Tempe counterpart. The personnel are amiable, erudite, and accommodating, and the prices are remarkably reasonable. For instance, today, I inquired about a specific vintage that I hold in high regard, and not only did they have it in stock, but it was also available at a substantial discount of forty-three percent in comparison to the price I had been paying at another purported discount retailer. Consequently, I hastened to this location and purchased a case of said wine, thereby eliciting feelings of jubilation and satisfaction."
The food here is amazing. I have tried more then half of it and it's all great. The staff is fun and the customers new and old mike you feel at home. This is a great place to relax and have a blast.

We opted to sell our hockey tickets for this evening in favor of indulging in a delectable dining experience at the newly established Park Bruges, situated just a few blocks away from our location. The edifice itself may not boast prominent signage, yet the tables positioned in the windows serve as an unmistakable indicator that one has arrived at the correct destination. 

Upon entering the eatery, we were immediately struck by the well-organized workflow and exceptional quality of service proffered by the staff, leading us to conjecture that the management had recruited seasoned professionals to join their team. Our server exhibited a thorough knowledge of both the menu and the assortment of beers available on tap, and we appreciated the attentive nature of their service, which never lapsed into prolonged periods of absence. 

My spouse and I elected to share the establishment's signature dish, the "classic" poutine, which proved to be a judicious decision. The fries retained a satisfying crispness on the exterior while maintaining a fluffy texture within the gravy, and the cheese curds offered a delightful squeakiness that further enhanced the dish's flavor profile. My entree selection consisted of a succulent chicken breast complemented by artichokes, mushrooms, and risotto, while my husband opted for the fresh wild fish option. Both dishes were executed to perfection, with each bite showcasing the culinary prowess of the kitchen staff. 

Furthermore, we sampled several dessert offerings, all of which demonstrated exceptional craftsmanship and taste. Although the coffee did not quite reach the lofty standards we had anticipated, it still proved to be a satisfactory accompaniment to our meal. Notably, we observed a smattering of families with young children enjoying their dining experience, suggesting that Park Bruges may be a more relaxed and family-friendly alternative to Point Brugge. Consequently, we may consider bringing our offspring for a leisurely lunch in the future. 

In conclusion, our dining excursion to Park Bruges yielded an exceptionally pleasant experience, particularly considering the establishment's recent opening. We eagerly look forward to revisiting the restaurant and relishing its culinary delights once again. Moreover, we implore the management to consider installing sidewalk tables during the forthcoming summer months, thereby enhancing the ambiance and providing patrons with an alfresco dining option.

This marked my maiden visit to this eatery, and ordinarily, I refrain from penning a review until after my second helping. However, given the establishment's prolonged tenure since 1963, I surmised that they must be executing certain aspects correctly, thereby warranting an immediate critique. Frankly, the culinary experience was nothing short of exceptional, boasting the most delectable Mexican fare I have had the pleasure of savoring in the Phoenix vicinity. The homemade salsa proved a highlight, not merely due to its generous portioning but also its undeniable zest and freshness. In the evening, I opted for the carne asada chimichanga, which unequivocally ranked as the most satisfying chimichanga I have had the pleasure of consuming. The house-made tortillas lent an unmistakable authenticity, while the apparent pan-frying technique employed resulted in an abundance of grease, a welcome attribute in my book. Accompanied by guacamole and sour cream, the dish struck a satisfying balance, although I could nitpick that the portioning of these condiments perhaps bordered on excessive. Nonetheless, such minor quibbles hardly warranted deductions. The Spanish rice, prepared to perfection, rivaled my own rendition, a testament to the kitchen's proficiency. Upon our arrival, the happy hour was underway, graciously offering half-priced beverages. An added bonus, to be sure! Furthermore, standard drinks, such as soda or iced tea, arrived in copious glasses, effectively doubling the delight. Although seemingly trivial, these nuances contributed significantly to the overall enjoyment. Without question, I shall return to this restaurant in the near future, and my experiences thus far suggest that it may even supersede Serrano's. While the interior design proved unremarkable, the culinary prowess more than compensated for any aesthetic shortcomings.

Tonight, I had the pleasure of dining at Jade Palace, a culinary establishment that, despite its unassuming exterior, delivered an exceptional gastronomical experience. Initially, I harbored reservations regarding the quality of the restaurant, given the prevalence of mediocre eateries in the vicinity that, paradoxically, maintain a steady clientele. However, my concerns were quickly alleviated upon entering the establishment, as the ambiance was warm and inviting, and the staff exhibited a proficient level of hospitality. The server, in particular, was attentive and efficient, ensuring that my glass of ice tea was perpetually replenished and that any dirty dishes were expeditiously removed from the table. It was indeed a welcome surprise to discover that the eatery not only offered delectable fare but also provided exceptional customer service, a combination that is sadly uncommon in today's dining scene. Of course, the pice de rsistance was the egg rolls, which were a masterful blend of flavors and textures that left me in a state of gustatory nirvana. In conclusion, Jade Palace has earned my unequivocal endorsement, and I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a satisfying dining experience.

"Ronald's Donuts had been an enigmatic entity on my gastronomical bucket list for approximately three years, perpetually eluding my culinary endeavors. However, fate intervened, and we chanced upon its humble abode in our vicinity. The kaleidoscope of choices precipitated an unmitigated state of euphoria, rendering me utterly indecisive. After a brief struggle with my gluttonous tendencies, I managed to curate a diverse medley of six donuts. 

The assortment proved to be an unparalleled gustatory experience, boasting plump, fluffy morsels that defied the conventional standards of their Krispy Kreme counterparts. A visual representation can be found here: [insert image]. 

Furthermore, the establishment's commitment to providing patrons with a warm, welcoming ambiance and personalized attention only served to enhance the overall enjoyment of their delectable offerings. In light of this revelation, it appears that Krispy Kreme has unwittingly relinquished its position as my preferred purveyor of sweet treats. Hail, Ronald's Donuts, the new monarch of my donut-centric desires!"

"Exceptional client servicing proffered by a team of erudite and congenial personnel. While not the most economical option in the locality, the superior quality of their wares and dedication to customer satisfaction render the additional expense entirely justifiable. Unwavering endorsement and enthusiastic recommendation are forthcoming, as the caliber of their products and services surpasses expectations and renders the investment worthwhile in its entirety."

One of my acquaintances coerced me into visiting this establishment subsequent to her excursion to New York City, where she indulged in culinary delights at the authentic location situated beneath the iconic Brooklyn Bridge. My initial reluctance to partake in this dining experience was precipitated by the ostentatious appearance of the exterior facade, which failed to align with my personal preferences for a pizza-oriented eatery. However, upon entering the premises, my preconceived notions were promptly dispelled, as the ambiance was transformed into an inviting and comfortable setting.  
 We initiated our repast with beverages, opting for a root beer due to the early hour of 12 pm, which did not warrant a glass of wine, and much to my delight, they offered a keg version of root beer, which was truly remarkable.  
Subsequently, we proceeded to sample the mozzarella, basil, and tomato salad, which was tantamount to a gastronomical masterpiece, albeit briefly perplexed by its categorization under the salad section, given its non-salad composition.  
Furthermore, we indulged in the Pesto Pizza, devoid of any additional toppings, and it was utterly sublime, possessing the capacity to satiate my cravings indefinitely.  
This pizzeria ranks among the finest within the city limits, boasting an advantageous location that enhances its appeal. The pesto pizza is a must-try item; hence, I strongly advise visiting this establishment and consuming copious amounts of their delectable fare.

My favorite place in Phoenix. 

Chris makes the most amazing cocktails in the city. Just tell him what you like and poof! He'll make  you something delicious. 

As for the food, also amazing and unique. Ask for the special because it usually rocks. 

I never get tired of going here as it is the best restaurant in Phoenix!

"We returned two evenings subsequent to our participation in a running event at Boulder Dam, accompanied by my significant other, and encountered one of the bar managers in attendance. Our experience was utterly enjoyable! The establishment offered an extensive array of brews on their menu, which we thoroughly relished during our prolonged visit. I opted for the fried cheese curds once more, which were nothing short of extraordinary! 

I am perplexed by the prevalence of dissatisfaction regarding the cleanliness of the glassware, as I failed to notice any such issues. 

While it may require a moderate trek from the strip, this venue boasts an unparalleled selection of fine brews in Las Vegas, at remarkably reasonable prices. One can indulge in a flavorful beverage, sans the exorbitant cost associated with mediocre beverages on the Strip."

It is impossible to adequately convey my unwavering endorsement of this establishment; the exceptional quality of the haircuts, the remarkable proficiency of the barbers, and the meticulously curated ambiance of the barbershop collectively conspire to create an unparalleled experience that is simply unmatched by any comparable venue. Upon arriving at midday, we were delightfully surprised to find a sizable assemblage of patrons eagerly awaiting their turns, which served as unequivocal testimony to the superiority of the services offered herein. Despite the considerable wait, we were warmly received and encouraged to linger, during which time we were treated to an entertaining array of banter and humor, further enhancing the convivial atmosphere. Our group of six was accommodated with consummate ease on the momentous occasion of my nuptials, and the painstaking attention to detail lavished upon each client resulted in breathtaking transformations that exceeded our most optimistic expectations. Furthermore, my own barber's generosity in providing his expertise gratis as a wedding gift left me utterly speechless. The pinnacle of their considerate service was reached when, faced with an imminent delay due to the prolonged nature of our visit, one of the barbers selflessly offered to transport us back to our hotel, ensuring our timely arrival for the impending wedding photography session and averting potential disaster. In conclusion, these gentlemen are veritable masters of their craft, and I shall unhesitatingly recommend them to anyone seeking an exceptional grooming experience in Las Vegas.

The female individual stationed at the Makeup Forever kiosk, who's name is Sarah, has demonstrated an exceptional proficiency in her field of expertise, as her extensive knowledge and aptitude in the realm of cosmetology has enabled her to provide exemplary service to clients, such as myself, who have had the privilege of receiving her professional assistance, resulting in a transformation of their visage that exudes an aura of glamour and sophistication, thus making them feel confident and prepared for any forthcoming social engagement.

I would like to bestow upon DB an evaluation of 4.5 stars, however, the exceptionally affable demeanor of the bartenders compels me to augment the rating. My culinary excursion transpired in the company of a companion, whereupon I partook of a solitary repast at the bar, marking the first instance in which I have indulged in a restaurant meal unaccompanied, as my fellow diner was engaged in a business conference. I must admit that consuming a meal solo, attired in evening finery, possesses a certain je ne sais quoi, as it tends to attract the attention of gentlemen of both respectable and questionable character. Notwithstanding, the experience proved to be remarkably empowering, and upon the arrival of my associate subsequent to her meeting, the bartenders appeared to harbor no doubts regarding my authenticity as a patron rather than a lady of the night.  
The gastronomical offerings sampled during my visit encompassed a sublime foie gras, a passable crab salad, and a succulent duck. The albarino recommended by the bartender fell short of expectations, yet the assortment of desserts more than compensated for this minor setback. In fact, our duo of sweet treats proved so delectable that their specific identities elude my memory, owing to a state of gastric satiation. A libation from the bar rounded out the meal nicely, setting the stage for an evening of merriment. 
For an optimal dining experience, I recommend securing a table offering a view of the Lake of Dreams, thereby allowing you to observe the captivating dancing frog performance. Furthermore, I encourage ladies to embrace the notion of solo dining at the bar, as it fosters an atmosphere of liberation and enjoyment. Just be sure to steer clear of solitary male patrons of dubious intentions and engage in conversation with the friendly bartenders instead.

I was a neophyte in the realm of vaping and, consequently, requested that my spouse venture into the establishment (given our proximity to the store) to acquire some e-liquid. The personnel within the store were remarkably helpful and expounded upon the attributes of the product to ensure my spouse comprehended its nature prior to procurement. Subsequent to this initial encounter, I have become a habitual patron of the store, purchasing my e-liquid thereupon (FlavorZ by Joe - CoolPort) and obtaining my hardware from that location as well. Although I possess an ardent fascination with technology, my experiences with online retailers have been less than optimal - resulting in my preference for visiting a physical store, whereupon I can receive instantaneous, complimentary guidance, conveyed with a cordial demeanor. I would recommend paying a visit to this establishment, as it boasts a welcoming ambiance, pristine surroundings, and a secure environment for parking one's vehicle.

"An exceptional morning repast was had by yours truly, as I partook of the Sunrise sandwich, while my significant other indulged in the Holy Puerco - both culinary creations were utterly delectable. My attention was particularly captivated by the homemade biscuit, which possessed a delightfully airy and fluffy texture that was remarkably absent of any trace of aridity. The hospitality displayed by the establishment's personnel was nothing short of extraordinary, fostering an ambiance that was simultaneously convivial and tranquil. It is with great enthusiasm that I advocate for a visit to this esteemed eatery."

"Culinary excellence is exemplified by the delectable offerings at this esteemed eatery, whereupon the discerning patron may indulge in an array of gastronomical delights, including, but not limited to, the unparalleled onion rings, which are an absolute necessity for any individual seeking to satiate their hunger; furthermore, the buffalo wings, tatchos, and truffle mac & cheese are also highly recommended, while the chicken tortilla soup, although palatable, may not necessarily meet the expectations of those with more refined taste buds; however, the prices are reasonable and the quality of the cuisine is undeniable, making it an excellent value for the cost, whether one chooses to dine in or partake in the convenience of takeout."

"I experimented with the culinary offering denoted as 'white pizza' in conjunction with a 'picnic sandwich.' The former dish surpassed my expectations, ranking as the most delectable rendition of a white pizza that I have had the pleasure of consuming at any establishment thus far. The latter dish, characterized by its freshness, did not disappoint, either. I eagerly anticipate partaking in their morning meal offerings in the future."

"It is patently evident that this establishment holds a certain allure for me, despite the fact that it may possess a certain air of nostalgia; however, I would argue that this sentimental value does not serve as the primary motivation behind my frequent visits. Indeed, I have had the pleasure of dining at numerous pizza factories throughout my travels - four to be exact, with two located in California and one in Washington - yet, this particular venue remains my unequivocal favorite. Although it may be somewhat diminutive in stature, the quality of the cuisine more than compensates for its modest size. My spouse, too, has partaken in the delectable offerings of this eatery, indulging in an array of sandwiches and pizzas, and has expressed unwavering satisfaction with the culinary experience provided. I take great pleasure in introducing visitors, both local and transient, to the charms of this restaurant, and their gratitude towards me is palpable. The proprietor and his kin are ever-present, ensuring that each patron receives exceptional hospitality. It is my fervent recommendation that you pay a visit to this esteemed establishment and sample, for yourself, the delectable garlic breadsticks - a gastronomic delight, if I do say so myself. Moreover, I do not hesitate to traverse a distance of 15 minutes from Goodyear, as I consider it a journey well worth undertaking."

"Culinary excellence, exceptional value, and superior customer service. Personnel exhibited remarkable hospitality and communication skills, speaking impeccable English. An extensive menu offered an array of delectable options, perhaps slightly excessive in scope. A spotless and welcoming ambiance permeated the establishment."

I am delighted to convey my unwavering affection towards Costco, as they boast an exceptional return policy that exemplifies their commitment to customer satisfaction. Additionally, they offer an extensive array of culinary delights, including an abundance of pre-prepared specialty foods, which cater to the diverse tastes of their clientele. Furthermore, their prices are generally reasonable across a broad spectrum of products, and their floral arrangements are consistently impressive. On weekends, specifically Saturdays and Sundays, they proffer delectable hors d'oeuvres that are sure to satiate even the most discerning palates. Moreover, membership with them is particularly advantageous when seeking to acquire electronic items, as it allows for the convenient return of Xboxes in favor of the latest versions, thus ensuring that customers remain up-to-date with cutting-edge technology.

"It is my unequivocal conviction that the individuals in question possess exceptional proficiency in their field of expertise, as evidenced by their comprehensive familiarity with the merchandise and their exemplary conduct characterized by benevolence, forthrightness, and impartiality in every aspect. It is emphatically recommended that you entrust your automotive repair needs to their capable hands, thereby eliminating any uncertainty and optimizing the outcome. As an individual who has had the privilege of owning multiple Mercedes-Benz vehicles and possessing a considerable amount of knowledge regarding their intricacies, I can unequivocally endorse the exceptional quality of service provided by the team at MB Motors, whose expertise and dedication to their craft are truly commendable. Kudos to you all!!"

"It transpires that the effusive acclaim surrounding this establishment is indeed well-founded! ;-) Mr. Stark cordially acknowledges each patron's arrival, extending a warm welcome in the form of a handshake and an inquiry regarding their name. As a lone female visitor, I must confess that I did not experience even a modicum of discomfort. The pizza slices, both the thick and the thin varieties, were utterly delectable, with the New York-style deep dish variant earning my unequivocal endorsement as the superior option. Mr. Stark's perambulations throughout the premises, engaging in conversation with guests, served to create an atmosphere of unpretentious hospitality that made one feel thoroughly at ease. A minor suggestion, which may be deemed somewhat fastidious given that I was dining solo, would be to consider implementing table-side ordering to obviate the necessity of queuing at the cash register. Notwithstanding this trivial caveat, I assure you that my return visit is imminent."

"Indubitably, this eatery constitutes one of my preferred destinations for a midday repast when I am in pursuit of either a sandwich, salad, or soup variety of sustenance. They proffer an extensive array of delectable options encompassing all three categories, in addition to copious baked potatoes adorned with tantalizing toppings. The ambiance is unpretentious, spotless, and the staff is accommodating, rendering it an optimal setting for a leisurely meal. The menu presents an assortment of imaginative alternatives for each category, exemplified by the ORANGE CRANBERRY CLUB, which combines smoked turkey, hickory ham, applewood smoked bacon, cheddar, Swiss, lite mayo, lettuce, tomatoes, and orange cranberry sauce on harvest wheat bread. Upon sampling this particular sandwich, I experienced a novel sensation within my palate, as the unique fusion of flavors afforded by the inclusion of orange cranberry sauce had not previously been indulged in by yours truly. Furthermore, the establishment boasts Wi-Fi connectivity, thereby facilitating web access for its patrons."

I have had the privilege of being a devoted student of Sifu Baugh's since the year 2003, and my sole regret is that I did not have the opportunity to discover him earlier. Prior to finding Sifu Baugh, I had been studying various forms of martial arts since the 1980's and had unfortunately encountered several questionable instructors. However, upon meeting Sifu Baugh, I was immediately impressed by his exceptional teaching skills and dedication to his students' progress. As a seasoned practitioner of numerous styles, including Chen Tai Chi, Yang Tai Chi, Northern and Southern forms of Kung Fu, Praying Mantis, Xing Yi, Ba Qua, and other traditional Kung Fu forms, Sifu Baugh possesses a vast wealth of knowledge and expertise. What sets him apart from other instructors is his unwavering commitment to helping his students achieve their full potential, without any concern for personal recognition or ego. His humility and approachability have earned him the respect of fellow martial arts teachers in the community, some of whom he even trains himself. For those seeking a genuine and well-established Kung Fu school with experienced and qualified instructors, reasonable monthly fees, no restrictive annual contracts, diverse class offerings, and an environment free from egotistical attitudes, Sifu Baugh's school stands out as the optimal choice for a lifelong training experience.

"Gastronomical excellence and an ambiance of unparalleled refinement, all at an unbeatably reasonable costsuch is the culinary experience that this esteemed establishment offers. As a gourmand who relishes the pleasure of savoring delectable fare, I must aver that the authentic Vietnamese cuisine served here is truly exceptional, with the Pho and Mong dishes being particularly noteworthy. In my opinion, the quality of the edibles served at this venue is unmatched, and the attentive and courteous service only serves to enhance the overall epicurean delight. In conclusion, I highly recommend partaking in the gustatory indulgence offered by this restaurant, and I am confident that your taste buds will thank you."
Love that this place opened up near me, if your looking for middle eastern groceries this is a good spot...the fresh flat bread is a must at my house now!

Peridot Sweets made our wedding cake, and coming up on our second anniversary, people are still talking about how beautiful it looked and how delicious it was. Tiffany created a custom cake using out colors and style preference. They also provided a dessert buffet as well.. Our guests loved the shortbread cookies and brownie pops! Thanks Peridot Sweets!

"Boasting an extensive array of over 150 diverse offerings, this establishment catered to a wide range of palates, featuring delectable Mongolian BBQ, sushi, and the customary assortment of dishes commonly associated with traditional Chinese cuisine. The culinary experience was truly delightful, as the fare was not only fresh and piping hot but also of exceptional quality, with each item showcasing the chef's dedication to utilizing only the finest ingredients. Sampling a variety of dishes, I was thoroughly impressed by the tenderness of the beef, the absence of excess fat, and the succulent texture of the chicken, while the shrimp entrees boasted perfectly cooked seafood, neither undercooked nor overcooked. Furthermore, the vegetables were crisp and flavorful, and the cooking method employed ensured that the dishes were not overly greasy. 

The level of service provided was equally impressive, as the staff demonstrated exceptional attentiveness, promptly refilling water glasses and soda, expeditiously clearing used plates, and even thoughtfully providing a knife upon request at the buffet station. While the menu may not strictly adhere to traditional Asian culinary practices, the dining experience was undeniably satisfying, particularly considering the unbeatable value offered by the $7.95 lunch buffet."

Upon our arrival, we were cordially received and escorted to our table, whereupon we were enveloped by an atmosphere of refined elegance, complemented by the melodious strains of live Persian music. Following a brief interval of approximately 15 minutes, during which we savored the ambiance, our culinary selections were presented before us, and we were delighted to discover that the delectable offerings were indeed worthy of our expectations. It is with great enthusiasm that we endorse this establishment, and we would unhesitatingly advocate for its merits to any individual seeking a dining experience that exudes an air of sophistication and refinement.

This eatery proved to be exceptionally satisfactory, with their pancakes and hash browns being particularly delectable. Furthermore, the prices they charge are extremely reasonable, making it an unbeatable value. However, what truly sets this establishment apart is the proprietor himself, who exhibits an unwavering commitment to ensuring each patron feels valued and cared for. He engages with every customer, inquiring about their preferences and backgrounds, thereby creating an atmosphere akin to being a welcome guest in his home, rather than merely a client in a restaurant. Consequently, I shall unquestionably revisit this establishment on my next visit to Las Vegas and extend my sincere gratitude to Mr. Mamas for providing me with such a delightful encounter.

I have been an ardent devotee of Ticoz for a considerable duration, and my patronage has afforded me the opportunity to sample a diverse array of their culinary offerings. Throughout my numerous visits, I have yet to encounter an item that failed to meet my expectations. In fact, I would highly recommend the Street Tacos - particularly the shrimp variety, which holds a special place in my heart as my favorite. The Street Tacos entre comes accompanied by pinto beans and rice, which, in my opinion, is well worth the additional expense. However, for those seeking a more economical option, the tacos can also be obtained in the bar area during happy hour at approximately half the price. 
Furthermore, their calamari dish is truly exceptional, with the added bonus of a spicy jalapeo lime sauce served on the side. The Sunday brunch has consistently impressed me, and the mimosas are undoubtedly a highlight. 
Upon entering the establishment, one cannot help but notice the sleek, modern dcor that permeates the interior. Additionally, the patio situated at the rear of the premises is both aesthetically pleasing and provides a tranquil atmosphere, making it an ideal setting for al fresco dining. 
Lastly, I have had the pleasure of introducing numerous acquaintances to this esteemed eatery, and each individual has expressed their unwavering gratitude and admiration for the culinary prowess displayed by Ticoz's chefs. In conclusion, my experiences at Ticoz have been nothing short of extraordinary, and I would enthusiastically endorse this restaurant to anyone seeking a delectable dining experience.

"Sushi Kame, strategically positioned within the central business district of Champaign, finds itself amidst an array of upscale dining establishments, including Jim Gould, Escobar, and Kofusion. Despite its proximity to these high-end eateries, Sushi Kame boasts a menu that offers reasonably-priced options, defying the expectation of exorbitant prices often associated with its surroundings. The culinary offerings at this establishment are unpretentious and straightforward, lacking the extravagant embellishments commonly found at trendier venues in the area. Furthermore, the staff at Sushi Kame are renowned for their courteous demeanor and exceptional customer service. \n\nPatronizing Sushi Kame ensures that you will not be disappointed with your meal choice, as each item on the menu is carefully crafted to impress. For a piping hot soup option, consider the Udon soup, available with the addition of a single tempura shrimp for a nominal fee of $2.00. Alternatively, if you seek a meal that encompasses a variety of flavors and textures, the bento box is an excellent choice, comprising a protein of your choice, accompanied by a California tempura roll, a fresh salad, and a serving of steaming hot rice. Of paramount importance, however, is the exceptional quality of the sushi offered at Sushi Kame, which never fails to satisfy even the most discerning palate, and the restaurant never runs out of fresh fish."

My spouse and I had the pleasure of partaking in a culinary excursion to this esteemed establishment on the momentous occasion of our anniversary, and it is with great enthusiasm that I expound upon the exceptional quality of the service we received throughout the duration of our visit. The hospitality staff exhibited a praiseworthy balance of cordiality and respect, demonstrating a keen ability to anticipate and accommodate our needs without ever transgressing the bounds of propriety or, as is sometimes encountered in upscale eateries, adopting an air of superiority.  

The gastronomical offerings, ranging from introductory courses to primary selections and concluding with delectable desserts, were indeed a delight to the palate, with only a few instances of excessive saltiness detracting from an otherwise flawless execution. The visual presentation of each dish was likewise impressive, artfully arranged to tantalize the senses and showcase the culinary prowess of the chef.  

The interior design of the restaurant, while minimalist in style, exuded an understated elegance that complemented the overall ambiance, and the breathtaking panorama afforded by the establishment's prime location rendered every table an enviable vantage point. Furthermore, when considering the exceptional value offered, I am compelled to assert that the prices charged were eminently reasonable and in no way prohibitive. Suffice it to say, I harbor every intention of revisiting this gastronomic haven in the near future.

"This establishment offers an unparalleled dining experience, showcasing the most genuine and delectable Hawaiian BBQ cuisine in the state of Arizona. As a native Hawaiian, I can confidently attest that the flavors and presentation of the dishes served here are reminiscent of the traditional Korean BBQ restaurants found in the islands. While the menu boasts an impressive array of options, I would like to suggest the addition of cucumber kimchi as a regular item, as it would complement the existing offerings and enhance the overall culinary experience. I have had the pleasure of dining at this establishment on multiple occasions, and I must say that the quality and consistency of the food have never failed to impress. In my opinion, Paradise BBQ is the only restaurant in Arizona that serves Meat Jun, a staple dish of Hawaiian Korean BBQ, and it is a testament to their commitment to authenticity and excellence. Wishing there was a location in Chandler, as it would be a welcome addition to the local dining scene."

During my visit with acquaintances, I encountered a server displaying a rather disdainful attitude while attending to our needs. This individual not only erred in the provision of food and beverages but appeared disinterested in rectifying these errors, seemingly unmindful of their impact on our overall experience. However, subsequent correspondence via electronic mail with the proprietors revealed a concerted effort by this establishment to prioritize customer satisfaction and enhance their overall experience. Despite these initial setbacks, I maintain a willingness to revisit this venue, given its commendable culinary offerings and believe that a visit to this establishment would be highly recommended.

"We had an overnight stay at this establishment, and our experience was nothing short of exceptional. Our accommodations were meticulously clean and offered a picturesque view of the pool area, which featured sunbathers indulging in the warmth of the sun. The sleeping quarters were equipped with a bed that was among the most comfortable I have had the pleasure of sleeping in, which contributed to a restful slumber. The customer service provided by the front desk staff was consistently helpful and cordial. We spent a considerable amount of time enjoying the amenities at C4, where the servers were very kind and attentive, even when dealing with some of my acquaintances who were inebriated. The beverages served were potent enough to induce a pleasant state of intoxication, and their prices were reasonable. When we opted for room service, there was a brief delay, which led me to contact the hotel staff. They promptly addressed the issue, and the food was delivered within a few minutes, accompanied by the assurance that there would be no charge. The quality of the sandwich was impressive, and it was evident that the culinary staff had put forth significant effort in its preparation. Based on our extremely satisfying experience, we will undoubtedly choose to stay at this hotel again during our future visits to Phoenix. Although the cost was comparable to other nearby establishments, the unique ambiance and exceptional service made it a superior choice."
Came here with friends for a birthday dessert. Quaint atmosphere with very attentive staff. Tried the Strawberry Kiss, Chocolate Brownie, and profiteroles. Hella good.

"Airport cuisine...drab, exorbitant, and inadequately portioned, one might presume? Think again, my fellow gastronomic adventurer, for this particular establishment defies such mediocre expectations with an uninterrupted sequence of gustatory delights. From the refreshingly chilled beverage to the delectable Caesar salad, and ultimately, the savory, piping hot pizza, this dining experience is crowned by exceptional hospitality (although, it must be noted that the practice of seat-yourself seating does raise certain questions regarding gratuities, the staff's diligence in expeditiously delivering the culinary offerings, replete with a warm smile, swiftly dispels any such concerns). As a self-proclaimed connoisseur of all things Caesar, I must confess that the restaurant's rendition, featuring a pleasing harmony of succulent romaine lettuce, judiciously applied dressing, a generous sprinkling of Parmesan, and crunchy, freshly prepared croutons, proved utterly captivating, and the generous entree-sized salad, available for a mere six dollars, bordered on the absurdly generous. Furthermore, the eight-dollar pizza, boasting a flavorsome, herbaceous sauce, a delicate, crackery crust, and an abundance of fresh basil, represented an unmitigated delight; its modest price tag, a veritable bargain. In conclusion, I would not hesitate to extend an invitation to my nearest and dearest relatives, merely to partake in the epicurean splendor that this establishment has to offer."

"Terminated our most recent escapade in Las Vegas with a delectable brunch at Bouchon, whereupon we encountered a negligible waiting period on a Monday afternoon, a circumstance that rendered the experience even more delightful. Our server, whose name unfortunately eludes my recollection, albeit I am convinced it commenced with an 'R', delivered exceptional hospitality, manifesting itself in his wit, sincerity, and accommodating demeanor. In response to our request for a table modification and several adjustments to our order, he reacted affably, exhibiting a cheerful disposition. The menu presented an array of tantalizing options, and the dishes we selected were nothing short of culinary masterpieces. My personal preference was the corned beef hash, complemented by a duet of potato croquettes and a refreshing bloody mary. The portions were generous, rendering the meal sufficient to serve as breakfast for the ensuing morning upon our return home. Furthermore, dining at this establishment afforded us a 15% discount voucher, redeemable at any of the bakeries situated along the famed Las Vegas Strip."

"Excellent patronage experience. Diminutive, cozy ambiance. Plush seating. Distinctive culinary and potable alternatives. Recent renovations. Additionally, an elegant bar featuring sofas for patrons awaiting entry into their cinematic experience. \n\nI had the pleasure of visiting this esteemed establishment for the initial time during the current week. My gratitude is extended to the festive period, which offers an abundance of exceptional motion pictures premiering, thereby providing me with multiple opportunities to return to the Manor."

"A remarkable dining establishment that offers copious amounts of delectable breakfast cuisine, conveniently located in Henderson, Nevada, for individuals seeking a leisurely culinary experience while relaxing in the city. Upon arriving on a bustling Sunday morning, we encountered a brief waiting period of approximately 15 minutes before being seated, which is quite reasonable given the high volume of patrons. It is worth noting that both the friendly servers and the local clientele demonstrate commendable efficiency in their respective roles. The eggs are skillfully prepared and presented, while the house potatoes are truly exceptional - thinly sliced, gently sauted with a touch of salt and pepper, and remarkably addictive, much like potato chips. Additionally, the pumpkin bread is delightfully moist and flavorful. We highly recommend this diner for a satisfying dining experience, and for those who prioritize healthy options, consider bringing your own Stevia sweetener packets for your coffee, as the establishment only offers Sweet'N Low or other less desirable alternatives."

"New Living Pools operates with unwavering integrity and unparalleled proficiency under the astute leadership of Chris, an industry expert who possesses a profound understanding of pool construction and maintenance. It is my unequivocal endorsement that New Living Pools delivers exceptional results, and I assure you that your expectations will be exceeded."

I tried this restaurant with a friend and I had the spaghetti.  It was delicious.  The waitress was great too.  The prices weren't high either.  All I have to say about this restaurant is positive.  I will be going back for sure and you would be wise to check it out for yourself.  We went around 5:30 p.m. and it was very quiet.\n\nS. Cooper

"Numerous IMAX theaters are present in this location, offering a plethora of cinematic experiences with top-notch sound and visual quality, complemented by delectable popcorn. The diverse selection of films features a wide range of genres, ensuring that there is something for every moviegoer's taste. Moreover, the theater's slight removal from the bustling strip affords a more tranquil atmosphere, minimizing the inconvenience caused by large crowds and enabling a more enjoyable viewing experience."

"I am utterly thrilled that Sephora has now established a presence in the heart of Downtown Summerlin, thereby providing an unparalleled opportunity for patrons to indulge in an exceptional shopping experience. My initial visit to the esteemed VIB Rouge event in November was nothing short of a fairytale come true, as the friendly staff members warmly welcomed me and lavished me with attentive service, including a complimentary makeover and personalized shopping assistance that made me feel like royalty. Despite the considerable crowd that had gathered for the occasion, the employees demonstrated remarkable efficiency and dedication in their efforts to ensure that each customer received the utmost attention and care. I must extend my sincerest gratitude to Wendy, Destiny, Moriah, Carol, Toni, and the rest of the team for their generosity in providing me with an array of complimentary samples and expert advice on skincare, as well as their unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional customer service that far surpasses the norm. My sincere appreciation also extends to The PodBrother Show for their captivating production, which can be found at the following link: http://youtu.be/S0Lusii7Tl0."

I thoroughly enjoyed every moment of this production, relishing in its captivating nature and unapologetic portrayal of human sexuality. The incorporation of symbolic elements, fluid choreography, and an eclectic soundtrack served to enhance the overall experience, while the utilization of humor provided a welcome respite from the intensity of the performances. The costume design was equally impressive, showcasing a keen attention to detail that further immersed the audience into the world of Zumanity. By exploring diverse facets and nuances of sexuality, the show successfully challenged societal norms and conventions, fostering a liberating atmosphere that encouraged self-expression and acceptance. My enthusiasm for this production is such that I am eagerly anticipating a second viewing, preferably from a front-row booth to maximize my exposure to the raw energy and emotional depth of the performance.

"Ventanto, an upscale Italian eatery nestled in the heart of the city, has established itself as a culinary haven that boasts an unparalleled view, courteous and attentive staff, and a menu replete with delectable dishes that showcase the freshest ingredients and generous portion sizes. Such attributes have secured Ventanto a place among my preferred dining establishments, making it an ideal setting for a leisurely repast with friends or family. Upon entering the restaurant, guests are immediately struck by the captivating ambiance, which is characterized by elegant decor and an air of sophistication that permeates every aspect of the dining experience. The waitstaff, who are meticulously trained and possess an encyclopedic knowledge of the menu, exhibit a warmth and hospitality that puts patrons at ease, ensuring that their visit is nothing short of exceptional.
